name: firebug
content:

someone who deliberately starts fires or enjoys playing with fire: The shop was torched by a firebug who smashed a window and dropped a lit item inside. Young fire bugs have started fires over 649 acres of farmland in County Durham. Synonyms
arsonist
pyromaniac
More examplesFewer examplesPolice and fire experts are working together to track down the firebugs.Fire bugs tried to destroy the building, after dousing the front door with petrol.She loves to smell cigarette and cigar smoke, and matches. I think she’s a fire bug.
